install.name: AEC Module
install.author: Helder Garcia, David 'skOre' Deutsch
install.copyright: This module is released under the GNU/GPL License.
install.description: Module for use with Account Expiration Control Component.

param.name: pretext
param.label: Pre Text
param.description: Text that you want to display before the automatically generated text.

param.name: posttext
param.label: Post Text
param.description: Text that you want to display after the automatically generated text.

param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: show_expiration
param.label: Subscription Expiration Date
param.description: Choose if you want to display the end date of subscription.

param.name: displaypipeline
param.label: DisplayPipeline
param.description: If you have MicroIntegrations that write to the DisplayPipeline, enable this feature to actually display things.

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module
